question: Analyze the impact of social media presence on company revenue and market capitalization for the last year.

subtasks.task: Retrieve company social media engagement data from the social media info tables to assess activity levels on different platforms.
Collect the financial metrics related to revenue and market capitalization for the companies to understand their economic performance.
Join the social media engagement data with financial metrics to evaluate correlations between social media activity and financial performance indicators.
Analyze trends in social media engagement versus changes in revenue and market capitalization over the last year.
